divs: sighting detailsa massive triangle flew slowly over beaverton,or around 11:30 at night. it made no sounds or emissions. the structure looked as big as two football fields. each tip of the triangle had a glowing light and in the middle it had a sort of symmetrical light pattern. all the lights seemed to be a reddish color. i watched this for about 10-15 seconds until the triangle was blocked by the tree line. it was floating\flying pretty slow and it was disturbing how big and slow it was moving! it was less than a mile up in the sky.
Summary: A massive triangle flew slowly over Beaverton, Or around 11:30 at night. It made no sounds or emmisions. The structure looked as big as two football fields.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Beaverton
There were no other sightings in Beaverton on or around February 29th 2008
